weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr

Class ExpansionMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.ExpansionMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExpansionMetric.Entropy

    public abstract class ExpansionMetric
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Metrics evaluate the merit of an expansion (given the pre and post expansion class distribution) to chose the best.
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Clément Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateExpansions

        public abstract double[] evaluateExpansions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> preDist,
                                            java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> postDists)
        Evaluates expansion candidates based on the post-expansion class distribution predicted for the rule. If several post-expansion distributions are found, their score is put in order in the array returned. When evaluating an expansion on a numeric attribute, once the splitpoint is chosen, the antecedent could take either a <= or > condition. Both distributions are evaluated so as to chose the best condition
        Parameters:
        preDist - Previous distribution
        postDists - Post-expansion distributions
        Returns:
        An array of one score for each post-expansion distribution

      • getMetricRange

        public abstract double getMetricRange(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> preDist)
        Gets the range of the metric. Used to compute Hoeffding's bound.
        Parameters:
        preDist - Previous distribution
        Returns:
        The range of the metric
